name: Mick Mulvaney
summary: Former Acting White House Chief of Staff who resigned as Special Envoy to Northern Ireland after January 6 and later criticized Trump's fitness for office.

keyStatements.quote: I can't do it. I can't stay here. Those who choose to stay, and I have talked with some of them, are choosing to stay because they're worried the president might put someone worse in.
We didn't sign up for that.
Trump has lost the confidence of many in the Republican Party.

timeline.event: Became Acting White House Chief of Staff

timeline.significance: Became Special Envoy to Northern Ireland

credibility.background: Former White House Chief of Staff, OMB Director, U.S. Representative, served in multiple Trump roles
positions: Acting White House Chief of Staff (2019-2020)
